title: Can I carry the Qur'an(Mushaf) in my backpack along with shoes during Umrah?- Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: thalma says is it allowed to carry a must-have in the backpack where i have my shoes and some other things in it no the answer is no you cannot carry your must-haves alongside your shoes this is total disrespect and humilation for the Koran regardless of the reason whether you're going for Umbra or whatever you can carry the must-haves on its own to honor it and Allah knows best
